original_text: Then said his servants unto him, What thing is this that thou hast done? thou didst fast and weep for the child, while it was alive; but when the child was dead, thou didst rise and eat bread.
korean_text: 그의 신하들이 그에게 이르되 아이가 살았을 때에는 그를 위하여 금식하고 우시더니 죽은 후에는 일어나서 잡수시니 이 일이 어찌 됨이니이까 하니

sentences.original_text: Then said his servants unto him
What thing is this that thou hast done?
thou didst fast and weep for the child
but when the child was dead
thou didst rise and eat bread
